Title: Provides for children under the age of eighteen to wear protective headgear while skiing or snowboarding
Summary: Requires children under the age of eighteen to wear protective headgear while skiing or snowboarding; imposes civil fines for violations thereof; applies safety in skiing code requirements to snowboarders and snowboarding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law and the labor law, in relation to the duties of skiers and snowboarders
